title: 23 Unforgettable Twitter Moments in Golf
headline: 23 Unforgettable Twitter Moments in Golf
description: Professional golfers, and administrators, would be best served employing a 'think before you tweet' mantra while using Twitter. Luckily for us, they don't. We went through all the angry, vulgar and accidentally tweeted tweets and compiled the most memorable ones.
body: Professional golfers, and administrators, would be best served employing a 'think before you tweet' mantra while using Twitter. Luckily for us, they don't. We went through all the angry, vulgar and accidentally tweeted tweets and compiled the most memorable ones.
